This component will allow you to create a tooltip above selected text, like this. Multiple tips can be added, as you can see. The module is created with a class Tooltip.

Services

About Dropdowns

This component will allow you to create dropdowns that can be clicked to reveal additional information, and includes an icon that shows if the dropdown is opened or closed.

How it's made

The component is built with a class Dropdown. As many dropdowns as you need can be created.

about

This component creates tabbed content that is revealed when the tab is clicked. The active tab is highlighted and the active content is revealed.

functionality

When a new tab is clicked, the active tab is highlighted and its content is revealed. It is created using a class Tab component.

more info

As many tabs as you wish can be created in the html.

Snackbar

When the button is clicked, a snackbar component is created, then disappears after a short period of time.
